text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the shape.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the square K,H,D,E.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line EH is 8 units.
The length of the line DE is 8 units.
The lines DK and HK are perpendicular.
The lines KH and EH are perpendicular.
The lines DE and EH are perpendicular.
The lines KD and ED are perpendicular.
line_instances: There are lines KH, HE, ED, and DK, forming the square KHED.
